thread.title: Kit Laughlin
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Kit Laughlin

author: Kit Laughlin
title: Kit Laughlin
text:
On-line reviews tend to hyperbole: "better then best" or "worst than worst".
The service I received at Store DJ was excellent; the prices are fair; the Mackie Freeplay arrived on time and was well packaged.
I usually buy camera and sound gear from either BHPhotovideo or Sweetwater (I run a small productions company) but from now on will be looking at Store DJ first. I will comment though that while the big items are reasonably priced (with respect NY prices, dollar conversion, and GST and the very expensive shipping from the US), but ancillaries like Li-Ion batteries, stands, and bags are relatively very expensive to buy here.
Still, the old adage "caveat emptor" applies to on-line shopping as it does elsewhere, so potential buyers can do comparisons themselves.
A perfectly satisfactory experience.
